statements: UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', age=35, gender='Male', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;

UPDATE customers SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com', city = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith', state = 'California', phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 202;
UPDATE customers SET age = 35, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'High' WHERE customer_id = 102 AND category = 'Sports';
UPDATE customers SET first_name='Alice', location='New York' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE preferences SET category='Food', preference_value='Italian' WHERE customer_id=102 AND preference_id=201;
UPDATE customers SET age = 35 WHERE customer_id = 1234;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'new_value' WHERE customer_id = 5678 AND preference_category = 'category1';
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
